analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/29/0xd27b389de0234421dd98fe901c922ad4029cfe88.sol:
	Contract MallCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/29/0xd27b389de0234421dd98fe901c922ad4029cfe88.sol#220)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/29/0xd27b389de0234421dd98fe901c922ad4029cfe88.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
